statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); printf "➜  $(basename "$current_dir") "; if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=''; if ! git -C "$current_dir" diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then status=' ✗'; fi; printf "git:($branch)$status "; fi; printf "[$model_name]"
